context.text: List of heads of regimes who were later imprisoned - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Names indexed by surnames Countries Dates born Official positions Later imprisonment Dates died
List of heads of regimes who were later imprisoned

This is a list of heads of regimes who were later imprisoned . There have been several personalities throughout the history who went on to be Heads of State, or Heads of Government, like Presidents , Prime Ministers or monarchs of their respective nation states , who became prisoners later, including under house arrest .
List of heads of regimes who were later imprisoned
List of former heads of regimes who were sentenced to death List of former heads of regimes who were sentenced to death by hanging
^ 6 May 1868 in the Julian calendar ^ 4 July 1918 in the Julian calendar
